detail_desc: Watch with a metal-link bracelet and adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3.8 cm. Width of links 1 cm, length of bracelet 22 cm.

Sleeveless top in a crinkled viscose weave with an inset lace trim down the front. Narrow cut with gathers at the top, short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with a flounce at the hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake pockets at the back and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a short flounce over each shoulder and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Cropped, fitted top in cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a seam centre front and at the heels. Imitation leather insoles.
T-shirt with a print motif and raw edges.
Baby Exclusive. Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket and ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Loafers in shiny imitation leather with a decorative tab and seam at the front. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles and chunky soles.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist.
Knee-length dress in airy viscose with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Cardboard gift pack with a silk ribbon hanger at the top containing a pair of socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with glittery threads and elasticated tops.

Short dress in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a deep V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and decorative ties. Concealed zip in one side, an inset section at the waist with piped trims, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short skirt in soft twill with eyelets and lacing at the front and a concealed zip and button at the back. Unlined.

Top in soft pile with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, diagonal side pockets and an elasticated trim around the collar, cuffs and hem.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Calf-length kaftan in a lightweight weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell and recycled polyester blend containing glittery threads. V-neck, covered buttons down parts of the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats at the cuffs for added volume. Seam at the hem with a wide, pleated section, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with appliqués.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Wide, calf-length trousers in soft jersey with flap leg pockets and drawstring hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Headband in soft, rib-knit chenille with a knot detail at the front and gathers at the back.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in fine-knit lambswool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in washed superstretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Chest pocket, side and back pockets, a fake fly and press-studs at the sides.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a small chest pocket.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a square neckline with elastication and a frill trim and short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves with a decorative bow.
Cotton terry bath towel with a hood that has ears sewn on top and an embroidered motif on the front. Size 70x70 cm.
Knee-length, sleeveless jersey dress in a viscose blend. Deep neckline with wide horizontal straps at the back, and slits in the sides.
Non-wired bra in lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a soft cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sandals with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and cork and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Shopper in faux fur with two handles and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved, round-neck dress in soft fabric with an opening and decorative bow at the back of the neck, and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Bodice and skirt lined with jersey.
Shorts in airy cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Microfibre bralette with a lace back and mesh details. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with buttons at the back, a seam at the top with a sewn-on bow and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Short dress in a textured, cotton-blend weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with gathers on the shoulders and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a leg pocket with a taped zip. Tapered legs with wide ribbing at the hems.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Boxy jumper with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a NASA embroidered detail on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated, ribbed waistband with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a slightly wider neckline with a small frill trim, button placket and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Top, hooded jacket and a pair of joggers in soft organic cotton. Jacket with a lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Cotton jersey vest tops with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Long dress in viscose jersey with a lace bodice. Wide neckline with a V-neck at the back, short cap sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.
Open jacket in airy, dobby-weave viscose with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in a sturdy stretch weave with a glossy coating and an elasticated waist.
Fitted top with extra-long sleeves and decorative seams down the front and back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, V-neck, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, straight-cut top with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with flounces down the front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Slippers in soft fabric with a decorative moccasin seam at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and imitation suede soles with anti-slip protectors.
Bustier in a slightly stretchy weave with shoulder straps, shaped cups, a decorative knot at the front and a zip at the back. Lined.
Draped blouse in satin with a sheen. V-neck, buttons down the front, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Ribbed sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide foldover panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Calf-length pyjama bottoms in a gently draping, patterned viscose weave with a small frill trim at the top, an elasticated, drawstring waist and wide, straight legs.
Bracelets in various designs. Adjustable length.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jacket in woven fabric with decorative lace trims. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ties at the front.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Zip-through hoodie in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and diagonal front pockets. Jersey trims.
Short-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a straight-cut hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short dress woven in a viscose blend with a slight sheen. Fitted at the top with a small grandad collar, pin-tucks at the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and concealed buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves that define the shoulders and wide, buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gathered, voluminous balloon skirt. Lined in a cotton weave.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Imitation leather sandals with twill foot straps with frayed edges and an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
